name: FlappyNext
description:
Spectrum Next Flappy Game

Beta Version - This was built using CSPECT, I have never tried it on a real next, I am a few weeks from my Accelerated Next Arriving at the time of writing. Hopefully it works on a real speccy next.

Could not have got this far without help from Rusty Pixels, especially Michael Flashware.

  • Loads of other folk such a BleedingChuckNorris, Ped7g and others. Thanks.

I have set the bar low and looking to hit the Cassette 50 quality threshold, although personally I think this is a little bit better.
